name: Chamba
description: Chamba is a historic district known for its ancient temples, palaces, and handicrafts. The district offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and natural beauty with its numerous trekking trails and scenic valleys.
summary: Land of Ancient Temples and Handicrafts

locations.name: Laxmi Narayan Temple
locations.description: Laxmi Narayan Temple is one of the oldest and largest temples in Chamba, known for its architectural beauty and religious significance. It's a perfect example of the region's rich cultural heritage.

travelTips.bestTime: March to June and September to November
travelTips.transportation: Walking distance from Chamba bus stand
travelTips.accommodation: Multiple options available in Chamba town

locations.name: Khajjiar
locations.description: Khajjiar is often called the 'Mini Switzerland of India' due to its scenic beauty. It features a beautiful lake surrounded by deodar forests and offers various adventure activities.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: March to June

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for pleasant weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - ATMs available in town
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Chamba

locations.name: Chamera Lake
locations.description: Chamera Lake is a beautiful reservoir surrounded by mountains. It offers various water sports and is a perfect destination for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts.

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for water activities
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for activities
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Chamba
travelTips.accommodation: Stay in Chamba or nearby towns

locations.name: Bharmour
locations.description: Bharmour is an ancient town known for its temples and cultural heritage. It's the starting point for various treks and offers a glimpse into the region's rich history.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: May to October

travelTips.bestTime: May to October for trekking and sightseeing
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for local expenses
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Chamba

locations.name: Pangi Valley
locations.description: Pangi Valley is a remote and beautiful valley known for its pristine beauty and unique culture. It offers various trekking opportunities and is perfect for adventure seekers.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: June to September

travelTips.bestTime: June to September for trekking and sightseeing
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for local expenses
travelTips.transportation: Requires permit, best to book through local tour operators
